job_description: I developed and maintained microservices to support secure transaction processing within a FinTech platform, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems. I implemented JWT and OAuth2 protocols to enhance user authentication and authorization processes, improving overall security. I utilized Pandas to analyze transaction data and generate reports for compliance and risk assessment. I collaborated with the team using Scrum methodology to plan and execute sprint tasks efficiently. Additionally, I managed secrets and sensitive credentials using secrets management practices and deployed cloud resources on AWS to ensure reliable service availability, with CSS applied to implementation and maintenance.

Developed and maintained microservices architecture to support SaaS platform functionalities, ensuring seamless integration and scalability. Utilized Azure to deploy, monitor, and optimize cloud-based applications, leveraging its services for reliable infrastructure management. Designed and executed API testing workflows using Postman to validate service endpoints and improve overall system robustness. Built and fine-tuned standard engineering practices models with Hugging Face, enhancing natural language understanding capabilities within the platform. Wrote Python scripts to automate deployment processes, data processing tasks, and system monitoring, reducing manual effort and increasing efficiency. Conducted code reviews and collaborated with engineering teams to implement best practices for microservice development and deployment.
